changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "signature" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "state" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "signed_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "failure_reason" TEXT NULL, "value" TEXT NULL, "hash" TEXT NULL, "metadata" JSONB NULL, "document_id" UUID NOT NULL, "account_id" UUID NOT NULL, "certificate_id" UUID NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("document_id") REFERENCES "document" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("certificate_id") REFERENCES "certificate" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, UNIQUE ("document_id", "account_id") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_signature_account_id" ON "signature" ("account_id");
